a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Based on the assessments and index by Polity 5 (2021), weighted by countries' populations. It captures the extent
to which open, multi-party, and competitive elections choose a chief executive who faces comprehensive
institutional constraints, and political participation is competitive. It ranges from -10 to 10 (fully democratic).
